subject: Re: FW: Website update
preview: Thanks, Chris. I'll show the team and get back to you.  Regards,  Jayne 😊

full_threads.body:
Thanks, Chris. I'll show the team and get back to you.

Regards,

Jayne 😊

Hi Jayne, 

I hope all is well. Can I please ask you to review the new patient registration form, the direct link can be found here: https://northshoreent.com.au/new-patients/

Please let me know what you like and what you'd like to see tweaked.
Hi @manuel, thanks, looking great, sharing with the client now.

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body: @chris I think All good now..

@manuel looks great and we are close, thanks Manuel. Some small tweaks below: 

1. Increase the white font labels used on the form. 
2. Increase the padding above the button on mobile view (photo)

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body: Hi @manuel, can we please aim to complete this today?

Hi @manuel can you please update the following: https://northshoreent.com.au/new-patients/

1. please make sure the field label font size is consistent. We also need to increase the font size and it is almost impossible to read on mobile device.
2. please add an button with anchor link:
Button copy: "NEW PATIENT REGISTRATION"

hi @manuel, sorry for the delay here. Can you please adjust the following:

1. Copy/content to appear above the form

2. Introduce a full-width banner (screenshot) above the copy/content that contains:

Copy:
H3: New Patient Registration Form 
Paragraph: If you are new patient, please complete the registration form. 
Button: NEW PATIENT FORM

3. Form to be 100% width

Hi @ricaV2 @manuel,

I need to share this with client to review before going live. Please standby for my approval.

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
@chris @ricaV2 Please check it now before we transfer it to live.

https://staging-northshoreent.kinsta.cloud/patient-registration-form/

Thanks

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
@ricaV2 Can you please assign to who may be best positioning to tackle this task?

I feel the email below (to Jayne) should contain enough information, if further clarification is needed please let me know!

Hi Jayne, 

Thanks for your email. 

We can recreate the form used on Hills ENT while using the North Shore ENT colours and styling. 

My suggestions to tackle your wish list are as follows: 

1. Re-create the form as found on the Hills ENT website, except for needing a Medicare number to proceed
2. The information on page https://northshoreent.com.au/new-patients/ to be full-width. 
3. The same page to have a full-width banner titled "New Patient Registration Form". A button will then take the user down (via an anchor link) to a full-width version of the new form. 

Perhaps we can jump on a screen share to run through the suggestion if needed.

Hi Jayne, 

Thanks for your message. Just a quick note to let you know Chris was on leave today and yesterday, hence why you have not heard back. Chris will be in the office on Monday and will get back to you ASAP.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris,

Thank you so much for sending it through. I've had a really good look at it and I'm so sorry, but it's a bit messy. There have been so many changes and it was a bit frustrating having gone through it all with IT and then having to re-do. You've been amazing and I was wondering if we could do it in sections, like Hills Ent. I absolutely love the way they have the different sections, contact info, medical accounts, GP info and general info. I think that makes a lot more sense to us and it's a lot less messy. Is there any way we could do similar? The only thing I don't like about theirs is that you must enter a medicare card number to be able to proceed, but we have a number of patients who don't have medicare. Other than that, I really like their structure.

Could we also amend our page so that the info on the left side of the screen lines up further to the left, therefore, leaving us with more room on the right for our patient registration? It seems a little squished.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Regards

Jayne
Logged a total of 45mins to harvest

Hi Jayne, 

Great to speak earlier. 

Confirming we have completed the updates and the draft form is ready for your review, please use this link to see the updates: https://northshoreent.com.au/new-patients-draft/

Once approved, we'll get the form live on your website.
Hi @chris done adding a paragraph, please check thanks
Hi @jaime all looks great, we just need to start a paragraph in the position marked on screenshot.
